event_text: m_c feels as though the responsibility of leadership is crushing them.
m_c calls a Clan meeting to give an important announcement.
m_c confesses they don't have many lives left.
m_c feels burdened with the weight of their descisions, knowing that every choice they make could mean the difference between victory and defeat.
m_c's relationships with their clanmates are strained, with some questioning their decisions and others relying on them more heavily than ever.
m_c is forced to be a symbol of strength and unity for their clan, even in the face of their own doubts and fears.
